title: Ticket #4662: Minor bug in non-blocking authentication
description:
When adding non-blocking operation to CEDAR authentication, one minor item from the code review for #4137 wasn't addressed before 8.3.1 was released. Here's the note from the code review:

  • In SecManStartCommand::authenticate_inner(), ReliSock::authenticate() is always called in non-blocking mode. Should this be based on SecManStartCommand::m_nonblocking?

We haven't seen any bad effects from this yet.
remarks:
